After this card enters play: Choose two keywords; Courtier, Samurai, Archer, Artisan, Cavalry, Duelist, Elite, Historian, Kensai, Magistrate, Stalwart. This Personality has the two keywords last chosen from the previous trait.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Forest Your Nonhuman Personalities enter play from this province paying 1 less Gold. Reaction: Before an action resolves, bow this card: Negate its effects that move any Personalities into an attacking army at this province's battlefield.
